name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MR Title Copier for git software

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to copy the MR title with the URL linked on GitLab MR pages and the Tags page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly Share GitLab Merge Requests with Linked Titles

MR Title Copier for git software is a handy Chrome extension designed to enhance your productivity when working with GitLab Merge Requests. With a single click, this extension allows you to copy the title of any GitLab Merge Request (MR) along with its URL, formatted as a rich-text link with the MR title. It also adds buttons on the tags page where the same data is copied, but for tags. Perfect for developers, project managers, and anyone who needs to quickly share or document MRs in code reviews, project discussions, or documentation. It can be pasted easily into tools like Slack, Microsoft Teams, Zoom, or other team tools that support rich text. 

Key Features:

- One-Click Copy  
Adds a convenient button on every GitLab MR page to copy the MR title and URL and on the tags page as well. All copied in rich text or Markdown format.

- Linked Titles
The copied text is formatted as a rich-text link, making it easy to paste into documents, comments, or chat messages with clickable titles.

- Seamless Integration
Automatically integrates into the GitLab MR interface without disrupting your workflow.

- Time-Saving
Eliminates the need to manually copy and format MR titles and URLs, saving you valuable time.

Why Install GitLab MR Title Copier?
- Boost Productivity
Streamline the process of sharing MRs, making collaboration with your team smoother and more efficient.

- Reduce Errors
Avoid mistakes that can occur when manually copying and pasting MR titles and URLs.

- Improve Communication: 
Share well-formatted, clickable links that enhance readability and accessibility in your communications.

Whether you're managing multiple MRs daily or just need a reliable tool to enhance your GitLab experience, GitLab MR Title Copier is an essential addition to your browser. Install now and start sharing GitLab MRs with ease!
